channel.title: Npc at exact coorinates
channel.description:
hmm just say i want death at coords at 3252,3421 and i dont want him as a shop. just something saying something example type ::switch to get ancients. or pk at ::pk wat do i modify i tried modifiying
client.java npchandler.java autospawn.cfg
well if someone could giv me a tutorial that would be AWESOME i tried looking already and no luck.[br][size=1]Posted on: September 13, 2007, 07:43:49 PM[/size][hr]this includes shops. im just bumbping this once soz. if nothing happens i wont bump again ight [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] Rules 4 & 5, re-read the rules http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,3.0.html[/center]

item.title: Npc at exact coorinates
item.dc:creator: @Nemes1s Nemes1s
item.description:
@Nemes1s wrote:

Open up autospawn.cfg, and add death where you want him.
Then open up NPC Handler and search for “moo”
Then you should see if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo"; } }
After the } press enter and paste this:

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC ID) { if (misc.random2(22) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "TEXT HERE"; } }

Read full topic
